title: Is the modern education enhancing moral values? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Perhaps there may be some institutions still trying to do so, but majority is not following the core goal of education. Modern education is not for life, it’s for a job. We are not producing humans ready for life, we are producing people ready to take on the job. Increasing competition and hardship to survival are the driving factor for this.

Modern education is only inculcating money into our mind. Unfortunately modern education system is generating brain geniuses who want to work abroad or doctors who want to operate for earning and not for treating. The right way is to use first 3 years of schooling only for values and manners. Only this base can help the students to digest education and put it to good use.
